title: Additional Libraries
content: Foundation is awesome, but it can't do everything! Listed here are a few useful libraries either used on this site or the many client sites I develop(ed):
lib-list: prism.js: An amazing code highlighter, it's usage is highly recommended if you display more than a small amount of code throughout a site. Prism Docs

lib-examples.name: PrismJS
lib-examples.snippet: @todo find a cleaner multiline solution here!
